text:
Hi all!, please help me to fix this issue
I'm trying to submit an email template which is created by custom module and drag and drop builder. But when m trying to submit it, it shows an error message

I have created many emails but i have never got to see this kinda error message yet.
Hi Anamika, you need to add an icon to your custom module. Please see here: <https://designers.HubSpot.com/docs/building-blocks/modules/configuration#adding-an-icon>
